about_the_game:
Featuring two different episodes in this retro survival horror:
Necrosis - step into the deeps of Kuroshinji Mines to finally find out the truth
Old town - expirience new world-changing ability, that heroine grants after long-awaited meeting with her mother



Fragile Reflection is a retro-styled 3rd person survival-horror game set in Japan in the late 1990s, in the dark corners of a mysterious city shrouded in darkness and secrets.

Coming back home went completely wrong: village got twisted by Noh masks and Reflection is piercing into our reality….
Find items, solve puzzles, fight monsters and traverse between dimensions - Help Kario Ito reveal hidden mysteries and stay alive in this retro-styled survival horror!



Enjoy the combination of retro graphics and modern controls.
The game is inspired by the aesthetics of the classic survival horror game series.



As you progress through the story, you discover a supernatural power that gives you the ability to move between the ordinary world and Reflection.
Reflection is an otherworldly place that preserves traces of the past. Use two worlds to solve puzzles and find answers!



Something terrible has happened in this village - where did these creatures come from? Is it possible to stop this nightmare?
Help the heroine survive in this horror in reality and find her parents. Explore the Japanese city of Nankofuraku, solve puzzles, keep an eye on ammunition, make the environment benefit you!



After a disturbing call from the local hospital, Kario Ito immediately went to her hometown, Nankofuraku.
The heroine will have to find out what has been hidden from her all these years, and survive, fighting off grotesque monsters in masks of traditional Japanese Noh theater, storing history, symbolism and some special power.
The village is being engulfed by Reflection, a parallel world that holds fragments of the past events , feelings and emotions of people who lived on this sacred land.
Who will Kario ultimately trust if even her own reflection doesn't reveal the whole truth?


Features:
    Dimenshion shifting
Use supernatural power to solve puzzles and find the truth
    Retro styled
Graphics and atmosphere inspired by old horror console games
    Exploration & Story
Explore a mining village overgrown with rumors of mythical creatures, incidents and curses
    Sound & Music
Original OST in the style of Trip-hop, Ambient, Psy-Trip, inspired by the works of Akira Yamaoka

content_descriptors.notes: Fragile Reflection features violence, blood and gore

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit system; Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: it will run on Steam deck!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
